analysis: The documents cover a range of topics related to military governance, legal jurisdiction, and logistical support during and after conflicts. They address issues such as the jurisdiction of military courts over civilians, the governance of newly acquired territories (Philippines), the provision of aid to refugees and freedmen, and the management of military resources and personnel. Some documents also touch on political matters, such as the reception of foreign dignitaries and the treatment of former Confederate officials.
title: Military Governance, Jurisdiction, and Logistical Directives
